formattedAddress: 19 Christopher St Store B, New York, NY 10014, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Duke of Hallberg (The Duke of Hallberg)
Duke of Hallberg (The Duke of Hallberg)

adrFormatAddress: 19 Christopher St Store B, New York, NY 10014, USA

editorialSummary.text: Elegant boutique specializing in men's custom suits made with luxurious fabrics, plus accessories.

originalText.text:
I was in the market for a new suit and J. Mueser came highly recommended by one of the best dressed men I know.  I have an athletic build and any suits I buy off the rack require extensive alterations.
When I contacted the shop, Jake was cordial and immediately let me know that he would do everything possible to make himself available throughout the process.  Because I currently live outside of the USA but frequently return for business this availability set my mind at ease.
At the initial consultation, Jake and I talked about his selections.  Jake is easy-going and the vibe of the shop is cool.  I wanted to have a full Bespoke suit made but my travel schedule would not allow this.  Instead I opted for the Custom option.  We decided on the fabric and Jake took a bunch of measurements.  Jake contacted me several weeks later and let me know that he had the suit and it looked beautiful.
I returned to the US, 6 months later excited to see my suit.  The suit was everything I imagined it would be.  The suit seemed to fit perfectly but Jake spotted a few areas that needed some adjusting.  He completed the adjustments and when I returned two weeks later.  I was amazed with the difference the seemingly small adjustments made to the fit of the suit.
J. Meuser far exceeded my expectations and I always get at least one compliment on the suit every time I wear it.  J. Mueser has made a regular customer and I would not hesitate to recommend that you have at least one J. Meuser suit in your wardrobe .

authorAttribution.displayName: Duke of Hallberg (The Duke of Hallberg)

originalText.text:
If you're looking for something a cut above, you've found it. I haven't had the pleasure of wearing a J.Mueser garment, but I've used Jake's shop for alterations and sleeve finishings. There are tailors and then there are tailors. Whether it's Jake, Jonas or Matt taking your measurements, the garment will come out fitting perfectly.

The attached sportcoat (not J. Mueser) came with unfinished sleeves. Many tailors will just stitch a button on there. Some will also stitch a faux buttonhole. Few will even stitch a functional buttonhole. And even fewer are the tailors who will stitch a handmade functional buttonhole for you. Of those, the ones that look as good as these holes are a rarity.

J.Mueser's in-house tailor is a gem in this city and beyond. Truly world-class, stop by for any and all work you need done. Whether you think you *need* such talented hands working on your garment or not, odds are you've been working hard and you certainly do deserve it.

originalText.text: Stumbled across this gem while walking around. I noticed them from Instagram and knew what to expect for the most part. Upon walking in my wife and I were greeted and the gentleman and I immediately connected based on our shared interests. What a beautiful store from off the rack to bespoke clothing. Highly recommend.

Highly recommend.

originalText.text: I got a bespoke tuxedo made here by recommendation from a friend who knows his fashion, and I was extremely happy with the result. You can be very specific with what you want and they accommodate well.

text.text: I got a bespoke tuxedo made here by recommendation from a friend who knows his fashion, and I was extremely happy with the result. You can be very specific with what you want and they accommodate well.

originalText.text: I have a custom tailored jacket and I love it more than anything I own. There is nothing more special to have in you closet than a piece that is exactly what you love made to measure.

text.text: I have a custom tailored jacket and I love it more than anything I own. There is nothing more special to have in you closet than a piece that is exactly what you love made to measure.
